description: Created digital artwork for clients, including commissioned projects and volunteer work.
Designed UI for multiple game projects. Developed concept art for characters, environments, and assets; produced 2D animations; illustrated backgrounds.

Managed and maintained databases using PostgreSQL and Oracle. Automated processes with JavaScript, Python, and VBScript (TestComplete). Modeled and optimized business processes using Camunda. Developed and maintained C# programs with GitHub version control. Performed data analysis and visualization using Microsoft Power BI Desktop. 
 Work conducted in English.
